definition: a thing made to be similar or identical to another thing, to make a replica of
details:
noun
- a thing made to be similar or identical to another thing
= example: a thing made to be similar or identical to another thing
- matter to be printed
= synonyms: written matter
- a reproduction of a written record (e.g. of a legal or school record)
= synonyms: transcript
- material suitable for a journalistic account
= example: material suitable for a journalistic account
verb
- to make a replica of
= example: to make a replica of
= synonyms: re-create
- to reproduce or make an exact copy of
= synonyms: replicate
- to reproduce someone's behavior or looks
= synonyms: simulate, imitate
- to copy down as is
= example: to copy down as is
